name: Heist (itch) (Johnybot)
description:
You have been tasked with defending the most precious resource in the war: Fuel. Wave after wave of enemies will fly in trying to steal our fuel for their own nefarious purposes. Stop the enemy by any means necessary, including sacrificing your ship. If we lose all of our fuel, that's game over for us. 

* Download and play in an emulator for the best results and two-player support

Web Controls: Player 1: Button Alt Button↑  Up W ↓  Down S ←  Left A →  Right D XA
ZB
ShiftSelect
Space Start Controls: ButtonActionStartStart / Restart / JoinDirectionsMoveA ShootB Break
